original_text: And the servant brought out jewelry of silver and of gold, and garments, and gave them to Rebekah. He also gave to her brother and to her mother costly ornaments.
korean_text: 은금 패물과 의복을 꺼내어 리브가에게 주고 그의 오라버니와 어머니에게도 보물을 주니라

sentences.original_text: And the servant brought out jewelry of silver and of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 종은 은과 금 보석을 꺼내왔고

sentences.original_text: He also gave to her brother
and to her mother costly ornaments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 어머니에게 값진 장신구를 주었다
